name: HolySlime (In Development)
description:
The controls for this game is simply WASD for movement.

The game is about a slime that lives in a plaforming game. But one day, that game has been broken and now holes have appeared in the game, releasing bugs and glitches. Even so, it is your job to fix this world as the slime that lives there, but beware, these holes are not as they seem... 

Staff who worked on this project:

  • BIGBOITREE - Main developer, scripter, desginer (basically the dude who made the game)
  • ErrorintheCode - Music artist, created all music themes in the game.
